member.name: P:KRPC.UI.Button.RectTransform
member.summary: The rect transform for the text.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.Button.Clicked
member.summary: Whether the button has been clicked.
member.remarks: This property is set to true when the user clicks the button. A client script should reset the property to false in order to detect subsequent button presses.

member.summary: The rect transform for the input field.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.InputField.Value
member.summary: The value of the input field.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.InputField.Text
member.summary: The text component of the input field.
member.remarks: Use to get and set the value in the field. This object can be used to alter the style of the input field's text.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.InputField.Changed
member.summary: Whether the input field has been changed.
member.remarks: This property is set to true when the user modifies the value of the input field. A client script should reset the property to false in order to detect subsequent changes.

member.summary: The rect transform for the panel.

member.summary: Create a panel within this panel.

member.name: T:KRPC.UI.RectTransform
member.summary: A Unity engine Rect Transform for a UI object. See the Unity manual for more details.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.RectTransform.Position
member.summary: Position of the rectangles pivot point relative to the anchors.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.RectTransform.LocalPosition
member.summary: Position of the rectangles pivot point relative to the anchors.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.RectTransform.Size
member.summary: Width and height of the rectangle.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.RectTransform.UpperRight
member.summary: Position of the rectangles upper right corner relative to the anchors.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.RectTransform.LowerLeft
member.summary: Position of the rectangles lower left corner relative to the anchors.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.RectTransform.Anchor
member.summary: Set the minimum and maximum anchor points as a fraction of the size of the parent rectangle.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.RectTransform.AnchorMax
member.summary: The anchor point for the lower left corner of the rectangle defined as a fraction of the size of the parent rectangle.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.RectTransform.AnchorMin
member.summary: The anchor point for the upper right corner of the rectangle defined as a fraction of the size of the parent rectangle.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.RectTransform.Pivot
member.summary: Location of the pivot point around which the rectangle rotates, defined as a fraction of the size of the rectangle itself.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.RectTransform.Rotation
member.summary: Rotation, as a quaternion, of the object around its pivot point.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.RectTransform.Scale
member.summary: Scale factor applied to the object in the x, y and z dimensions.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.Text.RectTransform
member.summary: The rect transform for the text.

member.name: P:KRPC.UI.Text.AvailableFonts
member.summary: A list of all available fonts.

member.name: T:KRPC.UI.UI
member.summary: Provides functionality for drawing and interacting with in-game user interface elements.
member.remarks: For drawing 3D objects in the flight scene, see the Drawing service.

member.name: M:KRPC.UI.UI.AddCanvas
member.remarks: If you want to add UI elements to KSPs stock UI canvas, use .

member.name: M:KRPC.UI.UI.Message(System.String,System.Single,KRPC.UI.MessagePosition,KRPC.Utils.Tuple{System.Double,System.Double,System.Double},System.Single)
member.summary: Display a message on the screen.
member.remarks: The message appears just like a stock message, for example quicksave or quickload messages.
member.param: Duration before the message disappears, in seconds.
Size of the message, differs per position.

member.name: M:KRPC.UI.UI.Clear(System.Boolean)
member.param: If true, only remove objects created by the calling client.
